charinfo.name: Kinuta Dosu
charinfo.description: One of the three sound genin, and possibly the strongest; Dosu is an intelligent and patient ninja that likes to act with logic. Using a powerful sound based arm, Dosu can disable his enemies by disrupting their hearing and throwing them off.

abilities.name: Resonating Echo Drill
abilities.description: Dosu attacks with his drill, dealing 20 damage to one enemy, and that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 2 turns. The following turn, 'Sound Manipulation' will deal 10 additional damage to that enemy.

abilities.name: Sound Manipulation
abilities.description: Dosu uses his sound waves to deal 10 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, that enemy will receive 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills and will deal 5 less damage from non-affliction skills. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Melody Arm Tuning
abilities.description: Dosu fine-tunes his Melody Arm to produce debilitating sound vibrations. The following 4 turns, 'Resonating Echo Drill' will deal 20 additional damage and 'Sound Manipulation' will deal 10 additional damage.

abilities.name: Agile Leap
abilities.description: This skill makes Kinuta Dosu invulnerable for 1 turn.
